posts.post_content:
I have $100 to spend and I really want to bulk up my T206 collection so I would like to buy as many cards as possible in 1 lot with that $100.

I'm not picky on condition (low grades or beaters are fine), all I ask is that the player's name is readable.

If you have cards to sell, please post here or PM or e-mail [url]JerseyDevils95@yahoo.com[/url] with how many cards you would be willing to sell me for that $100 and we can make a deal. I will be paying by Postal Money Order.

I'll throw my hat into the fray!  You can have this "well loved" Polar Bear lot for $85.  That way you'll have some money left over for Starbucks tomorrow morning (what the heck, live it up tomorrow....).

As per your strict condition requirements all player names are readable ;).

Lovely Day...

[quote name="iggyman" post=1017172]I'll throw my hat into the fray!  You can have this "well loved" Polar Bear lot for $85.  That way you'll have some money left over for Starbucks tomorrow morning (what the heck, live it up tomorrow....).

As per your strict condition requirements all player names are readable ;).

Lovely Day...[/QUOTE]

iggy, you have a PM.
This is done for now, I tried to respond to everyone, if I missed you, I'm sorry.
